value:
The scenery here is breathtaking...
Blue skies, beautiful flowers. It's
all so peaceful. I love it!

I may be of the Ice Tribe, but I long
for warm, sunny days. I just want to
relax in a sunbeam with my sister!

Woah! Did you eat something that
doesn't agree with you? Let's go
sit in the shade.

I may not be good in the kitchen, but
I pulled out all the stops to make
lunch for today. Let's eat it together!

You were looking a little tired, so
I made you some tea!$k$pUh...now you look even worse.

I've brought lunch! I made it just for
you—$Nf asked!

No matter the dish, leave it to me!
I'm a first-rate maid. It's what I do!
That lunch sure was tasty, wasn't it?

Urgh... I think that the meat was...
a touch underdone...

You didn't have to go to the trouble,
but I'm happy that I can help out
even more now!

I-I'm Felicia! Nice to meet you. I'm
a properly trained maid, so leave
the lunches to me!

Where am I? I've gone and gotten
myself lost again...when all I wanted
was share this lunch.$k$pOh, $Nu!
Is that you?$k$pWhat are you doing here? You're
looking for me? That's...that's so
sweet! *sniffle*$k$pI'm so grateful to you for putting
up with all of my clumsiness.$k$pI suppose it's a little late in the day
to eat now, isn't it? Don't worry—I'll
make you something nice soon!
えいやっ
Here I go.
きゃああっ！
Why...
Eat this!
Clear your plate!
Here's your meal!
I'll straighten this up!
Time for a nap...
Hehe!
I'm great at maid stuff, so leave the picnic prep to me!
Oh no! I didn't spill, did I?
Everyone says my cooking is to die for...and then they laugh...
I did my best. I hope everything turned out all right!
Whoa! Sorry. Dropped my tea tray.
♪Hm-hm-hmm... Picnic, picnic!♪
I wish we could share a nice picnic lunch like this every day...
♪Hmm-hm-hmm...♪
Picnic time!
Yummy!
